name: Colosseum
description: Iconic ancient Roman amphitheater, symbol of Rome.

name: Vatican Museums
description: World's greatest art collection including Sistine Chapel.

name: St. Peter's Basilica
description: Largest church in the world, masterpiece of Renaissance architecture.

name: Pantheon
description: Best-preserved ancient Roman building with iconic dome.

name: Trevi Fountain
description: Baroque masterpiece, throw a coin to return to Rome.

name: Roman Forum
description: Ancient ruins of Rome's political and commercial center.

name: Palatine Hill
description: Legendary birthplace of Rome with imperial palace ruins.

name: Spanish Steps
description: Iconic 135-step stairway, perfect for people watching.

name: Borghese Gallery
description: Bernini sculptures and Caravaggio paintings in a stunning villa.

name: Villa Borghese Gardens
description: Rome's Central Park - beautiful gardens and lake.

name: Castel Sant'Angelo
description: Former papal fortress with panoramic views of Rome.

name: Piazza Navona
description: Baroque square with Bernini's Fountain of Four Rivers.

name: Campo de' Fiori
description: Lively market square, great for food and atmosphere.

name: Trastevere Neighborhood
description: Charming cobblestone streets, best for evening walks.

name: Sistine Chapel
description: Michelangelo's ceiling masterpiece - included in Vatican Museums.
